item.title: Demand of your art
item.description: On a previous video/blog post, I talked about production planning using an example of selling art on the beach. One simplification of that model was the assumption that everything that we build can be sold. You can check the pluto notebook html or download the notebook. I have an excert down here, but for more details, check the video. If you just want, you can just skip to questions. As we saw on last episode, Javier is creating and selling his art on the beach.
